AUDIENCE: International graduate students who speak English as a second or additional language at the level of Advanced High* DESCRIPTION: ELSP 520 is designed to further the academic and professional speaking performance of the students who speak English at advanced high or superior levels, providing an environment for students to practice authentic  professional and academic speaking tasks with self-confidence. Students meet as a group for discussions, presentations, and classroom activities, as well as individually for one-on-one consultations with the instructor to receive individualized feedback and practice self-selected presentations, lectures, and discussions.
CONTACT hboldt@emory.edu for more details.
* Assessment of current proficiency level may be required
